questions.question: How do I use a bread proofing basket?
questions.answer: Lightly flour the basket to prevent sticking, then place the shaped dough inside, seam side up. Allow the dough to rise until ready, then gently turn the basket over onto a baking surface. The basket helps maintain the dough’s shape for a beautifully formed loaf.

questions.question: What are bread proofing baskets made of?
questions.answer: Yes, they are. For rattan baskets, you can tap out the excess flour and use a stiff brush to clean them. Cork baskets can even be washed under water. Liners also help keep them clean.

questions.question: Can I wash my bread proofing basket?
